ProductInfo.Features:
Complete Video Security System for Home or Office with Indoor and Outdoor Cameras
Instant motion-activated alerts sent to your mobile phone, PDA, and email account
View live video from any PC web browser in the world for free
Expand to up to 6 cameras with True 15 minute setup with no wires to run
Compatible with Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7
ProductInfo.Name: Logitech WiLife Video Security Indoor and Outdoor Master System Bundle with FREE 1 Year Platinum Service
